title: Same
context: §652-6 Same. Section 652-5 shall extend to successive persons and to the State or any political or municipal subdivision thereof, other than the original garnishee, employing the judgment debtor, until the judgment debt has been fully discharged. [L 1915, c 64, §2; am L 1919, c 161, §2; am L 1921, c 66, §1; RL 1925, §2831; am L 1927, c 96, §6; am L 1933, c 171, §3; RL 1935, §4275; RL 1945, §10306; RL 1955, §237-6; HRS §652-6]
